title: When your teammates are flaming each other, and you are just thankful they are not targeting you

replies.body:
Enough with the breaking bad memes already.

Do you just sit there with netflix open, making gif after gif in order to farm upvotes? The first 2 or 3 were funny, now it's just plain annoying.
Speak for yourself, I still think they're funny and I can totally relate to these gifs

Oh yeah, I have a fan
http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/yb.gif

Just a question, can you buy something with upvotes?

This guy said you are "farming" upvotes.
http://weknowgifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/breaking-bad-gif.gif
Nope, "farming upvotes" is just slang for someone trying to get a lot of attention for no reason except to get attention.
http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130102104737/breakingbad/images/8/8c/Shut-up.gif

> [{quoted}](name=C9 MonkeyD Luffy,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=vJiE51Rc,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-02T17:48:48.369+0000)
>
> Enough with the breaking bad memes already.
> 
> Do you just sit there with netflix open, making gif after gif in order to farm upvotes? The first 2 or 3 were funny, now it's just plain annoying.

Nerd
Memes > Riven Nerf Threads
better than 100 meme faces instead.
Nice name

I just keep doing my thing and try to carry the game.

http://media.giphy.com/media/xQcUyue226cM0/giphy.gif
http://31.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m55zeiRUSM1qii70fo3_r1_250.gif
"Tell Scarlet I *do* give a damn!"
http://i.ytimg.com/vi/ztJOLS-3Xls/maxresdefault.jpg

This movie was my childhood.
Still love Jim Carrey.

"WWTFF skrUb U WOT M8!!11"

"...I think he wants to communicate."
the mask...oh god my childhood lol
Then you try to defend  someone  being  wrongfully  abused ...

I know that feeling...  I was in a Normal game a while ago, and apparently our Blitzcrank support took ONE minion.  That was when the ADC Tristana went insane.  I've seen people get mad, but this was on a whole new level.  She was rage incarnate and it was a mix of confusing and terrifying and pathetic.  Mostly pathetic though.  I knew I should have stayed out of things, but the Blitz had been really friendly and funny in Champion Select, so I told the Trist to "Calm down, it's just a game."  Oops.  She did lay off Blitz for a while, but only because I was her new target.  I was mid and just ignored her raging chat-spam, but then pointed out that by her sitting in base raging at us, she was missing more CS than the one that the Blitz had taken.  She went back to farming, but still kept insulting everyone whenever there was a lull in combat.  

I know I could have muted her, but there was no point.  She was being an idiot and some of the things she said were so stupid and so needlessly angry that it was almost funny.  Almost.  Throughout the entire game I was thinking there are really people this stupid in the world...  
http://media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m1tq0l7b3l1qieybw.gif
"I AM THE ONE... WHO FARMS."

I had an Ashe in a ranked game tell the enemy team where our entire team was, when we were focusing dragon/baron, when we were planning on an ambush, etc, as well as running straight into all 5 of them and standing there, dying over 20 times by the 10 minute mark.

Why?
She said it was all because the support Annie was taking her farm. Annie had hit 1 creep while she was typing "GLHF" in all chat. Ashe said "I can't handle supports like this, GG" and proceeded to feed and assist the enemy team all game long.

I had an enemy do something similar once.  I don't remember much about it, but the enemy mid-laner (think it was an Ahri) repeatedly told everyone where her team's jungler (Cho'Gath) was, and when he was at low hp.  The reason?  Cho didn't give her the second blue buff, because he said he needed it and she had already died to our mid a few times.  She sat in her base and just gave his location and insulted everyone all game.  To my team's credit, we ignored her even though she was giving away his actual position.  Cho seemed like a pretty decent guy, and I felt bad for him.  At first asked her really nicely to stop, then ignored her and started joking around with us in chat.  Everyone agreed to report Ahri, and we tried to make it as fun a game as possible.

One time I was playing udyr jungle, and there was this lux support who insisted on taking my first blue. She said that she needed it more than I did, and since I didn't let her have it she started intentionally feeding, not only bot lane but roaming top to do the same.

I have one for you. I was mid and accidentally stole yi's first blue because bot wouldn't leash, so I thought I'd help him. He smited while I was attacking! Then he cried for 20 minutes in base after I already apologized after the event. I always took junglers to be a thick-skinned crew. Apparently not. This was not ranked BTW. XD

>Ashe said "I can't handle supports like this, GG" 

I can't handle stupidity like this. GG

*sighs*
another day of solo q

I was Sion one game with a Draven ADC, and he was nice and everything, he wasn't doing that bad, but this Lissandra and (someone else) were flaming him and crap, and I stuck up for the Draven because he didn't deserve anything.
We were winning that game too... It was really weird. I let Draven join me up top because if he went back mid or bot, he'd be with the flaming jerks...
Needless to say, after everyone left in the endgame chat, he thanked me for sticking up for him.
Felt good to not be a rager...
Just don't tell whichever one is Tuco to "calm down."

Sound advice my friend. Sound advice indeed. Would hate for this to happen:
http://ak-hdl.buzzfed.com/static/2013-09/enhanced/webdr05/26/12/anigif_enhanced-buzz-20520-1380213305-0.gif
KEEP DRINKING. JUST KEEP DRINKING AND NEVER STOP THEY WONT NOTICE YOU
test
So beautiful {{item:3070}}
